title: The great crab sandwich
ingredients: ['Crab paste', 'brown crabmeat from one large (1.5kg) crab', '1 lemon, cut into 4 wedges', '1 teaspoon mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon tomato ketchup', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1 teaspoon dijon mustard', '1 big pinch cayenne pepper', 'a few drops of brandy', 'For white meat', 'white meat from the same crab', '1 small handful chopped mixed herbs (parsley, dill, tarragon, chervil, chives)', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '2 teaspoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'For the sandwich', 'unsalted butter', '8 slices bread']
